snippet: The police say they believe one arsonist is responsible for the attacks against building projects of Bukharian Jews, who have sometimes inspired resentment for their large homes.
abstract: New York City police say they believe single arsonist is responsible for fires at four building sites in Forest Hills, Queens, all of which are owned by Bukharian Jews; arson appears to be escalation of longstanding dispute between Bukharian Jews in neighborhood and other residents, who have criticized large, opulent homes favored by Bukharian homeowners.
lead_paragraph: The police say they believe one arsonist is responsible for the attacks against building projects of Bukharian Jews, who have sometimes inspired resentment for their large homes.

headline.main: Police Believe a Single Arsonist Is Behind a String of Fires in Queens
headline.print_headline: Police Believe a Single Arsonist Is Behind a String of Fires in Queens
